alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Ojai Valley; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 8:00PM PST until February 22 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast, Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range, Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Lake Casitas, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
